mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_IMG, PRODUCT_MAKER, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRIC ) VALUES(#{productId}, #{productMaker}, #{productName}, #{productPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT I.PRODUCTIMG_PATH,I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME1,I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME2,I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME3, P.* FROM PRODUCTIMG I, PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = I.PRODUCT_ID
